lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie issued an executive order late Thursday declaring a state of emergency after negotiations to raise the state’s famously low gas tax stalled.

headline.print_headline: Christie Puts New Jersey Road Projects on Hold as Gas-Tax Deal Stalls
headline.main: With No Deal on New Jersey Gas Tax, Christie Orders Shutdown of Road Projects

snippet: Gov. Chris Christie issued an executive order late Thursday declaring a state of emergency after negotiations to raise the state’s famously low gas tax stalled....
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie declares state of emergency and orders state transportation commissioner and exec director of New Jersey Transit to submit plans for orderly shutdown of most work funded by state's transportation fund after deal with State Senate Democrats to raise gas tax fell through.
